name: Underground Adventures of Pebbly
description: This game is made for the Godot Wild Jam #45, it is my first time attending a game jam, as well as the fact that I have been using Godot for 4 days now! A really fun program, and I decided to release it early in order to work on different projects so I can learn even more. I recommend using a speedrun timer if you want to finish this game as fast as possible, it doesn't take too much time to beat, but the game is quite difficult
